createTable.remarks: Records the history and progress of multiregional -> single region workspace bucket migration attempts

column.name: WORKSPACE_ID
column.remarks: ID of the WORKSPACE being migrated.

column.name: CREATED
column.remarks: When the system scheduled migrating the WORKSPACE.

column.name: STARTED
column.remarks: When the system started migrating the WORKSPACE.

column.name: FINISHED
column.remarks: When the system finished migrating the WORKSPACE.

column.name: UPDATED
column.remarks: When the system last performed a step in the migration on the WORKSPACE.

column.name: OUTCOME
column.remarks: The state of migrating the WORKSPACE when the system FINISHED.

column.name: MESSAGE
column.remarks: Any supplemental message generated by the system, including failure messages.

column.name: WORKSPACE_BUCKET_IAM_REMOVED
column.remarks: When the system removed IAM from the original workspace bucket.

column.name: TMP_BUCKET_NAME
column.remarks: The name of the temporary bucket.

column.name: TMP_BUCKET_CREATED
column.remarks: When the system created the temporary bucket.

column.name: WORKSPACE_BUCKET_TRANSFER_IAM_CONFIGURED
column.remarks: When the system configured IAM for the workspace bucket transfer.

column.name: WORKSPACE_BUCKET_TRANSFER_JOB_ISSUED
column.remarks: When the system issued the transfer from workspace bucket to temporary bucket.

column.name: WORKSPACE_BUCKET_TRANSFERRED
column.remarks: When the transfer job from workspace bucket to temporary bucket completed.

column.name: WORKSPACE_BUCKET_DELETED
column.remarks: When the system deleted the original workspace bucket.

column.name: FINAL_BUCKET_CREATED
column.remarks: When the system created the final workspace bucket.

column.name: TMP_BUCKET_TRANSFER_IAM_CONFIGURED
column.remarks: When the system configured IAM for the temporary bucket transfer.

column.name: TMP_BUCKET_TRANSFER_JOB_ISSUED
column.remarks: When the system issued the transfer from temporary bucket to new workspace bucket.

column.name: TMP_BUCKET_TRANSFERRED
column.remarks: When the transfer job from temporary bucket to new workspace bucket completed.

column.name: TMP_BUCKET_DELETED
column.remarks: When the system deleted the temporary bucket.

column.name: FINAL_BUCKET_IAM_RESTORED
column.remarks: When the system restored IAM on the final workspace bucket.

column.name: REQUESTER_PAYS_ENABLED
column.remarks: Whether the workspace bucket was requester pays.

changeSet.author: mtalbott
changeSet.comment: The task of migrating a v1 workspace to a v2 workspace might fail for a number of reasons and it's important that we record these failures. An attempt at migrating any particular workspace is represented by an insertion into V1_WORKSPACE_MIGRATION_HISTORY. To prevent concurrent attempts, we'll only allow insertions when previous attempts have FINISHED.
changeSet.sql: CREATE TRIGGER fail_insert_if_workspace_is_being_migrated BEFORE INSERT ON MULTIREGIONAL_BUCKET_MIGRATION_HISTORY FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MULTIREGIONAL_BUCKET_MIGRATION_HISTORY h WHERE h.WORKSPACE_ID = NEW.WORKSPACE_ID AND h.FINISHED IS NULL) THEN SET @error_message = CONCAT_WS(' ', 'Workspace', NEW.WORKSPACE_ID, 'is already being migrated.'); SIGNAL SQLSTATE '45000' SET MESSAGE_TEXT = @error_message; END IF; END ~
